caption.p: Changes in the precipitation indices for evaluation. Differences from the present climate in domain-averaged 25-year means of the a daily mean precipitation (RAVE), b maximum one-day precipitation (R1D) and c maximum number of consecutive dry days (CDD), respectively. Δ is the total change estimated by the DDSs (Future-DDS − Present-DDS). Δ P 0 and Δ C 0 indicate the contributions of the perturbation and climatology, respectively. Δ cp is the contribution of the nonlinear effect
